entry.title: $2400 // NO BROKER FEE - 1 Bed Apt, One Block from Q
entry.content:
I'm moving to LA and have to get rid of this Apt. The location is fantastic and the apartments is super comfortable with tons of closet space. Also, it's on the 2nd floor which is awesome!

- NO BROKER FEE; just first month and security deposit
- Dishwasher
- Microwave
- Q train is at the end of the block!
- 6 train is only 2 blocks away

Available for Move-In, February 26th.

From the Streeteasy Post:

"This true one bedroom on the Upper East side features hardwood floors, large storage space, ample countertop space, and a bedroom that can easily fit a queen sized bed. The apartment has brand new stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher and microwave. Just one block away from the Q train and two blocks away from the 6 train, you'll have convenient access to the rest of Manhattan."
